mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_NUM, A.USER_ID, (SELECT COUNT(LECT_NUM) FROM T_BEDU_LECT C WHERE C.LECT_NUM = B.LECT_NUM) AS pageList FROM ( SELECT USER_NUM, USER_ID, (SELECT COUNT(LECT_NUM) FROM T_BEDU_LECT WHERE LECT_NUM = LECT_NUM) AS pageList FROM T_BEDU_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{email} ) A LEFT JOIN T_BEDU_USER_LECT B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT JOIN T_BEDU_LECT C ON C.LECT_NUM = B.LECT_NUM ORDER BY B.USER_LECT_NUM DESC
